topic.description: Subject matter or thematic focus of the record (affinity, element, discipline, etc.)

entity_type.description: Identifies the kind of record being described (skill, character, scene segment, lore entry).

function.description: Captures mechanical behavior or role, such as passive effects or mobility tools.

narrative.description: Narrative beats or events that occur inside chapters or scenes.

system.description: Tags that explain rules, provenance, or meta information about the System itself.

skill.description: Applies to definitions or discussions of skills rather than their usage.

scene.description: Used when tagging scene index entries or summaries.

lore.description: Marks records that primarily deliver background lore or world information.

stealth.description: Involves concealment, detection avoidance, or stealth-based tactics.

dark_affinity.description: Pertains to dark affinity revelations, bonuses, or mechanics.

archery.description: Relates to bows, arrows, or archery-centric techniques.

passive.description: Denotes abilities that provide ongoing effects without manual activation.

mobility.description: Marks skills or scenes emphasizing movement, repositioning, or escape tools.

skill_usage.description: A scene or excerpt where a specific skill is put into practice.

training.description: Focuses on practice, drills, or character development sessions.

unlock.description: Represents moments when a new capability, title, or skill becomes available.

level_up.description: Captures explicit level increases or System notifications awarding levels.

skill_lore.description: Explains how skills operate within the System, including flavor text or rules.

mechanic.description: Details a rule, calculation, or persistent mechanic within the System.

tutorial.description: Describes onboarding events, System prompts, or guided walkthroughs.
